def main():
    t = int(raw_input())
    for i in xrange(t):
        n = int(raw_input())
        S = map(int, raw_input().split())
        E = map(int, raw_input().split())
        minima = min(S)
        size = max(E)-minima
        G = [0 for i in xrange(size)]
        for j in xrange(n):
            for k in xrange(S[j]-1,E[j]-1):
                G[k-minima-1] += 1
        print max(G)

main()
